thread.title: Natasha Woodward

author: Natasha Woodward
title: Natasha Woodward
text: I am delighted by my experience of Trusted Housesitters, which has made our life so much easier. We've had three sets of house/catsitters so far, and they've been very pleasant to interact with, as well as looking after the house and cats well. It's been great to be able to share our home with people from around the world while we get peace of mind on holiday, and saves us from scrabbling around looking for someone to feed the cats. A win-win situation.
